name.description: A valid project short name WITH NO whitespaces

title.description: Title of the project being displayed on client

version.description: Version number of the project being displayed on client

buildPath.description: Destination folder where all packed files are being stored

privateKey.description: The private key to use to sign the client pbo files

serverDirs.description: A list of all server folders a pbo file should be generated for

clientDirs.description: A list of all client folders (usually one) a pbo file should be generated and signed for

host.description: The ftp server hostname or ip address
